name: Running the Clock
description:
A 1-bit rpg/puzzle game where you die every couple of seconds and have to destroy a nuclear reactor.

Longer description: You accidentally created a time loop where you die every couple of seconds. Now you must solve puzzles to destroy the nuclear reactor and fix everything.

Join the Rogapol Community discord server to discuss this game and get notified when we release a new game: https://discord.com/invite/b46pMRGtFq

Made by Boykala ( Coding + Game Design ), Galse87 (Art + Game Design ) and TheoTheTorch ( music ) . Special thanks to JMCDMusic for the walk sound effects.
